thig5.10:2.2: I follow the teaching of the Master,
thig5.10:2.3: I am not lazy nor conceited,
thig5.10:2.4: so why have I not attained Nirvana?
thig5.10:3.3: and noticed the water for washing the feet
thig5.10:4.1: From there I sought one-pointedness of mind,
thig5.10:4.5: Having looked at the sleeping ground,
thig5.10:4.6: I took a seat on a mat.
thig5.10:5.1: From there having taken the needle,
thig5.10:5.4: with the release of the light.
